connect20/webcreta_outofstocksubscriptio.name: connect20/Webcreta_OutofStockSubscription

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/webcreta_outofstocksubscriptio.description:
When a product is out of stock, the customer be able to request notification of availability 
entering an email address on the product detail page. The subscribers will be notified by email
when the product will be back in stock.
